action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
DESCRIPTION: The grid is 5 rows by 5 columns. The first four rows each have one empty square (▢) followed by four filled squares (X). The last row contains five empty squares (▢).

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix where each row has an increasing number of 'X' symbols from top to bottom. The first row has one 'X' followed by four blank spaces ('▢'). The second row has two 'X's followed by three blank spaces, and so on, until the fifth row, which is completely filled with 'X's.
